name: The Reincarnation (kolebas)
description:
Gather your Guts to become a higher creature!

How to play Controls:

Move: A, D or Left, Right

Jump: W, Space, Up

Attack: B (not available until you get hands. Some body parts can attack and break stuff)

The Dog is the current end of the game, but there are actually two outcomes with the dog.

psst try to collect all 6 Dog Toys in one Playtrough!!

Credits

Timo Scholz (@timosch) - most of programming, game design

Triin Tens - art, game design

Moreena Kaas - art, game design

Mykola Herasymovych (@mykola) - sound, least of programming, game design

Special thanks to APT GameGenerator for their great support.

All art and music were developed from scratch during the game jam. Sound effects were taken from https://freesound.org under the open source license and edited during the jam.
